subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN5148 is on the way
description_text:
This Order is Not sendet! Tracking says no pick up or Transport more then 3 month. So please send me the correkt number and send it Right now. One week with no movment is Not ok. If the Order dont come in time i will Call back my Money via Pay Pal, so make sure the Order is on his way!! Am 23.12.2025 um 11:53 schrieb SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com>: ﻿

 Your order is on the way. Track your shipment to see the delivery status.

 SF Express tracking number: SF6047195322708
 
 



 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Items in this shipment 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 



 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback × 1 

 
 VAM Pro Set (2 pac/includes power supply) 
 

 
 
 
 Part of: Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback 
 
 
 


 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 



 
 


 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at service@simsonn.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Felix. wildner,  We apologize for the delay. The motor parts only arrived today, so the warehouse may need a few days to ship your order. Combined with the backlog of emails and orders during the peak season, this may cause some delays. Thank you for your understanding.

Your Website say, Shipping only 4-6 Days! So you make promes to catch Buyers? This is Not ok. You have to send it now via express on your own Cost! Am 31.12.2025 um 05:13 schrieb service@simsonn.com: ﻿ 
 
 Hi Felix. wildner, We apologize for the delay. The motor parts only arrived today, so the warehouse may need a few days to ship your order. Combined with the backlog of emails and orders during the peak season, this may cause some delays. Thank you for your understanding.

Hi Felix. wildner,    We apologize for the inconvenience. The haptics are currently out of stock at our China warehouse as well. This product is incredibly popular, and we'll be able to ship yours next Monday.

So you Sell items thats out of Stock But Not Show This on your Site? Not ok! You will send at least the Shipping Cost back! This is Not the way you Deal with Customers! I Payed for the Shipping on time and you guys dont do it! On top they are high expensiv taxes. So now its your Turn to make This Order Right and the Customer happy. Because at the Moment i‘m thinking about to take my Money Back via Pay Pal and Contact my lawer. If you try to Trick your Customer This is not ok!
